name: blooey
content:
go blooey
Add to word list
Add to word list
to fail or stop working, often in a way that is very sudden and noticeable: The whole neighbourhood was in darkness because the electrical grid went blooey. Anyone who works in an office knows what it's like when your computer suddenly goes blooey. Synonym
haywire
More examplesFewer examplesIt seemed that the entire country's transportation, communication and utility systems had gone blooey.What if the car goes blooey on the way to the wedding?It's always good to have a backup plan in case everything goes blooey.It was the hottest day of the year and the air conditioner went blooey.
